summary: Defines a suite of slow integration tests for the Stable Diffusion ControlNet pipeline when using a single-file model format, checking that components load correctly, configurations (both diffusers and original) are respected, localâ€‘only file handling works, inference results match pretrained behavior, and datatype settings such as fp16 are applied properly.
business_intent: Validate the robustness and correctness of the ControlNet pipeline's single-file model support across diverse configuration scenarios to guarantee reliable performance for downstream image generation applications.
